title: Tesla, Berkshire, Occidental, Bitcoin: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Energy companies were slipping as crude prices fell
body: S&P 500 futures are slightly lower, suggesting the broad index will hover near its record high—but a drop in oil prices and volatility in gold suggest nervousness about the outlook as Covid-19 cases surge. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Monday’s open.
